extendedInfo.description: If you are Neon Trees's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Neon Trees's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Neon Trees's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Neon Trees's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Start a Fire- Habits- Picture Show--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- 1983- Alarm- Animal- Attraction- Calling My Name- Close To You- Everybody Talks- Farther Down- Girls And Boys In School- Helpless- Hooray For Hollywood- I Am The D.J.- In The Next Room- Lessons In Love (All Day, All Night)- Love And Affection- Mad Love- Moving In The Dark- Our War- Phones- Show- Sins Of My Youth- Still Young- Take Me For A Ride- Teenage Sounds- Tell Me You Love Me- The Death Of You And Me- Trust- Weekend- Your Surrender
